# removeAll()

**Instance Method**

Removes all anchors from the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func removeAll()
```

## Removing anchors

- **remove(_:)**: Removes the anchor at the specified position.
- **remove(at:)**: Removes and returns the anchor at the specified position.
- **removeAll(keepCapacity:)**: Removes all anchors from the collection.
